title: Traditional and emerging visions of European bison (Bison bonasus) conservation and management: Implication for the IUCN conservation planning
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 158

Author(s): Joanna Tusznio, Luis Santillan Gutierrez, Marianna Strzelecka, Krzysztof Niedziałkowski, Małgorzata Grodzińska-Jurczak
